Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 66th overall pick, by Oakland in 2006...
Injured on 9/9/2009 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Oakland to Milwaukee on 5/8/2010 (Going to MIL: 3B M. Grissom Jr., CF A. Presley, LF T. Robinson. Going to OAK: P C. Fussell)...
Traded from Milwaukee to Tampa Bay on 5/30/2010 (Going to MIL: P B. Myers, RF C. Beltran. Going to TB: P S. Blair, LF A. Presley, P B. Villarreal)...
Had first career hit on 6/16/2010, off Lou Pote (NYA)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/17/2010, off John Thomson (NYA)...
Injured on 8/28/2010 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Washington on 2/8/2011 (Going to TB: 1B A. Craig. Going to WSH: RF A. Presley)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/2013, hitting .483 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Florida on 4/25/2014...
Traded from Washington to Cleveland on 5/8/2014 (Going to CLE: SS O. Martinez, RF A. Presley. Going to WSH: CF J. Ellsbury)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2014...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2015...
Injured on 6/14/2016 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2016...
Traded from Cleveland to New York (A) on 4/21/2018 (Going to CLE: DH R. Raburn, RF M. Mahtook, P K. Gausman. Going to NYA: SS R. Pierson, RF A. Presley)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2018...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Kansas City on 9/10/2019...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 8/23/2020...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Tampa Bay on 9/20/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/4/2021, hitting .455 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Texas on 8/19/2022...
